lines.text: That should be a cinch.
I beg your pardon, Sir.
I said that should be a leadpipe cinch!
If I had choice of weapons with you, Sir, I'd choose grammar!
I'm goin' over to the insane asylum and hobnob with a few sensible people.
Never in all my questionable career have I gazed upon such divine lovliness.
Happy, in case you break anything, be sure it's your neck.
If we gotta dig up a husband for Annie, let's to it and get it over with.
Yeah, now you gotta dig up a husband for her.

[shouting]
Where you gonna get a husband just like that?
What about YOU, Happy?
Me?
Oh, that's a swell idea. I think you'd be just precious.
I've got a wife that's very fussy. She don't like for me to go around marryin' people! I know how unreasonable that must sound to you, but she's very funny that way.
Aw, pull up your chin, Happy. You're liable to step on it.

[about working in a hotel]
People don't leave things in their rooms anymore. Do you know it's got so bad I gotta buy me own toothpaste?
Whom do you wish to see, sir?
Is this Rodney Kent's apartment?
Uh, yes, sir, but he's away...
Ah, what gave you the idea I'd give a hang where he is?
Well, I... I assumed...
Don't go around assuming so much. It'll get you into trouble.
For years Annie's been lucky to me, ain't she?
What?
Well, what kind of luck would I have if I passed her up at a time like this?

[bringing in her entourage to work on Apple Annie]
Say, when they get through with her, she's gonna look every bit as good as me.
The idea is to make her look like a lady.
Say, listen, Babcock wore out the seats of two pair of pants just sitting around on his El Fideldo.
Enough tears around here to float a battleship.
It was a wise old sage who said that every man over forty should be exterminated.
Yeah, who said that?
I dunno, but someone should've said it.
Call it.
Heads.
Tails. That makes ME King of Siam.

[to a cop helping himself to an apple for free]
Come around to the house sometime. I got a lot of silverwear hanging around loose.
Hey, Dude, you mind if I have an idea?
Yeah?
Well, this here society friend of yours, uh... Rodney Kent, he's got an apartment at The Marberry...
He has, so what about it? What about it? Can you picture me goin' to Rodney Kent and sayin' "Lend me your apartment for Apple Annie?" He'd throw me out on my ear.
Huh. That's just what I was gonna say. He'd throw you out on your ear.
Shut up abut it, then!
I was just gonna do that.
Well look at this, billiards. Why did you not tell me you had a billiard room?
Do you play?
Do I play? Señor in Valencia I am champion!
Well isn't that just. You don't say?
I got it, I got just the one! Judge Henry G. Blake!
Who's he?
For a proposition like this we got to have a guy who talks classy don't we? Well Judge Blake is the classiest talker in town!
